title: Here is a curated list of 20 articles up to 2020 that focus on multi-modal information extraction for semi-structured and unstructured data understanding. These articles cover various aspects of the field, including methodologies, applications, and advancements in multi-modal data processing
**"Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing: A Review"**

author.literal: **"Attention Is All You Need"** - Vaswani et al.

title: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"**
**"Visual Question Answering: Datasets, Algorithms, and Future Challenges"** - Antol et al
Attend and Tell: Neural Image Caption Generation with Visual Attention"**
**"Unified Visual-Semantic Embeddings: Bridging Vision and Language with Structured Meaning Representations"**
**"Hierarchical Attention Networks for Document Classification"** - Yang et al
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** - Baltru≈°aitis et al
**"Learning Transferable Visual Models From Natural Language Supervision"** - Radford et al
**"Deep Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"**
**"Multimodal Information Extraction from Text and Images"** - Kiela et al
**"Image Captioning with Semantic Attention"** - You et al
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"**
**"Visual-Semantic Alignments for Generating Image Descriptions"**
**"Deep Learning for Multimodal Data Fusion: A Review"**
**"Aligning Books and Movies: Towards Story-like Visual Explanations by Watching Movies and Reading Books"**
**"End-to-End Neural Coreference Resolution"** - Lee et al
**"Learning to Compose Neural Networks for Question Answering"**
**"Multimodal Neural Language Models"** - Kiros et al
**"Deep Visual-Semantic Alignments for Generating Image Descriptions"** - Karpathy et al

These articles collectively provide a comprehensive overview of the state-of-the-art techniques and research trends in multi-modal information extraction and understanding for semi-structured and unstructured data
